hello.text: I've been stuck like this for days. Can't revert back to normal anymore.

how.text: Angry. Stuck. Can't even walk or fly straight.

what.text: I was laughing at Sekibanki and trying to imitate her.

check.text: {i}Nothing else aside from her face turned backwards.{s}

scanner.text: {i}Her bones and ligaments around the neck are twisted. Using her power like this was clearly a bad idea.{s}

prosthesis.text: {i}Her ailment is too serious for this...{s}

painkillers.text: Pain killers ? No thanks, pain makes me more alive !

operate.text: {i} *It takes you a few hours in the block, but you manage to put back most of her bones in the right place{s}
